meanings.definition: A list of names of people or things.
meanings.sent1: I keep a nomina of all my classmates' names in my notebook.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to create a nomina of famous scientists for our project.
meanings.sent3: My nomina of favorite foods keeps getting longer and longer!
meanings.sent4: The nomina of stars in the sky is like a map of the universe.
meanings.sent5: Her nomina of flowers included roses, daisies, and tulips.

meanings.sent1: I will nomina my new puppy 'Buddy' because he is my friend.
meanings.sent2: The explorer decided to nomina the newly discovered island 'Paradise'.
meanings.sent3: I nomina my plants to make them feel special and loved.
meanings.sent4: She nomina her paintings with unique titles that reflect their beauty.
meanings.sent5: The author will nomina the main character in her book after her grandmother.
